original: DAHLBERG, Knut, fd Direktör, fd Häradshövding, förutv Statsråd, Sthlm, f Malmö 23/5 77 av magistr.sekr Arvid D o Carolina Möllan-der, gm Ester Aurell. Jur kand Lund 00. Polisnot Malmö 06, stadsnot 08, omb.m dräts.kamm 07—17, rådm 13, statsr o ch f jordbr.-dep 30/3—19/10 17, konsult statsr 27/10 20— 13/10 21, hhövd i Sollentuna o Färentuna 21— 22, v. vkst dir Sv hdlsbkn 22—28, vkst dir Sv bkfrn 28—42, sekr o led av kommun komm o styr i Malmö, sakk i fin.dep ang Tullv:s org 12, led i inkorpor.lagstiftn.komm 13, stads-planelagstiftn.komm 16, v. ordf i folkhush.-kommiss 16, led av produkt.komm 17 o 18, ordf i sjöfolkslönekomm 19, sjölagstiftn.komm 19, centr skiljenmdn f arb.tvister 20, deleg v intern arb.konf i Genua 20, ordf i bolags-skatteberedn 28, led av skatteutjämn.beredn 30, ordf i frihamnssak 31, deleg v intern checkkonf i Geneve 31, led av rikskommis f ekon försv.beredsk 32, ordf i clearingnmdn 34, led av Nord mus nmd 35, valutastyr 40, styr f Sv skeppshyp.kass, AB Sv metallverken, Sv sockerfabrAB, Livförsäkr.bol Valand, styr.ordf i Sv kreditförsäkrAB. Av trycket: 1919 års lagstiftn ang kommun nybildn, 20. KmstkNO, KVOlkl, FinlFrihKlkl, RFinlVRO Ikl, KNS:tOOm kr, StOffTÖO, LLA.
translated: DAHLBERG, Knut, former Director, former District Judge, former Minister of State, Stockholm, born in Malmö on 23/5 1877, son of magistrate secretary Arvid D and Carolina Möllander, married to Ester Aurell. Law degree from Lund University in 1900. Police officer in Malmö in 1906, city officer in 1908, member of the municipal finance committee from 1907 to 1917, councilman in 1913, Minister of State and Chief of the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry from 30/3 to 19/10 1917, consultant for the Ministry of State from 27/10 1920 to 13/10 1921, governor of Sollentuna and Färentuna from 1921 to 1922, Acting Managing Director of the Swedish Trade Bank from 1922 to 1928, Acting Managing Director of the Swedish Bank Association from 1928 to 1942, secretary and member of various municipal committees and boards in Malmö, expert in the Ministry of Finance on Customs organization in 1912, member of the Incorporation Legislation Committee in 1913, member of the Urban Planning Legislation Committee in 1916, Vice Chairman of the People's Kitchen Commission in 1916, member of the Production Committee in 1917 and 1918, Chairman of the Seamen's Wage Commission in 1919, Seafaring Legislation Committee in 1919, Central Arbitration Board for Labor Disputes in 1920, delegate to the International Labor Conference in Geneva in 1920, Chairman of the Corporate Taxation Committee in 1928, member of the Tax Equalization Committee in 1930, Chairman of the Free Port Committee in 1931, delegate to the International Check Conference in Geneva in 1931, member of the National Economic Defense Commission in 1932, Chairman of the Clearing Board in 1934, member of the Nordic Museum Board in 1935, Currency Control Board in 1940, board of the Swedish Ship Mortgage Fund, AB Swedish Metal Works, AB Swedish Sugar Factory, Valand Life Insurance Company, Chairman of the Board of Directors of the Swedish Credit Insurance Company. Published works: 1919 legislation on the establishment of new municipalities, 1920. Knight First Class of the Order of the Polar Star, Knight of the Finnish Order of the White Rose, Knight of the Finnish Order of the Lion, Knight Grand Cross of the Order of Vasa, Commander of the Royal Norwegian Order of Merit, Commander 1st Class of the Order of St. Olav, Swedish Order of Freemasons, Swedish Order of Saint John, Swedish Red Cross Medal.
